widgets.title: Load time by Browser
widgets.nrql: from PageView select average(duration) facet userAgentName TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Front End user Experience
widgets.nrql: from PageView select average(duration) as 'Avg Page Load Time', max(duration) as 'Max Page Load Time', count(*)/10 as 'Page Views' timeseries

widgets.title: % Users Satisfied
widgets.nrql: SELECT apdex(duration, t: 1.0) FROM Transaction SINCE 3 week ago
widgets.notes: Users that are experiencing 1 second response time

widgets.title: Users by Experience
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(apdexPerfZone) FROM Transaction FACET apdexPerfZone SINCE 3 DAYS AGO TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Avg Tx duration
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET name since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Autoscaling Events
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(entityName) FROM AutoScalingGroupSample FACET entityName SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO

widgets.title: Avg Page load time by country
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(duration) as 'Load Time', count(username) as 'Users' FROM PageView FACET countryCode SINCE 30 MINUTES AGO limit 10
